author: ashish
msg: Done following things on Google Base in this pass:
1) Added the priority tag so Product should be published in 15 - 30 minutes on Google Base instead of waiting for 24 hours.
2) Added ProductType default values - I have put a TODO in code and will work on that thing soon.
The correct product type selection is very important - This helps to enlist product in the resultant list easily or we can say fast.
3) Batch tag was not being created right in the generated string. Fixed that issue.
